rooms.name: Entrance to Mega-City One
rooms.description:
A road begins here in the glowing sands.  You follow it through a gate
in a Plasteen wall onto the Megway of Mega-City One.

north.description: You see the glowing sand of the badlands.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

rooms.name: Mahmount Allesh Megway
rooms.description:
You are on one mile of over 13 and a half billion kilometers of
roadway in Mega-City One.  The Megway continues north and south.

north.description: The entrance to Mega-City One is in this direction.

rooms.name: Intersection of Junket Way and Megway
rooms.description:
The Megway intersects with Junket Way here.  Junket Way is to the east,
the Megway continues north and south, and the Pustule Palace Cafe is
to the west.

north.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

east.description: Junket way continues in this direction.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

west.description: The Pustule Palace Cafe is in this direction.

rooms.name: Mahmount Allesh Megway
rooms.description:
The traffic here is really congested due in part to the over 11 million
people driving Mo-Pads, the mobile homes which are constantly on the
move until their owners can find an apartment in one of the City-blocks.
The Megway continues north and south.

north.description: An intersection lies in this direction.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

rooms.name: Mahmount Allesh Megway
rooms.description:
The Megway continues north and south.  On the off-ramps here you see
many of the citizens of Mega-City One doing nothing.  You see of
every hundred citizens, it can be guaranteed that 87 of them will
be totally unemployed, and that a further five will not work more
than ten hours a week.  To the east there is a dark alley and to the
west is Rietzik's Shuggy Hall.

north.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

east.description: A dark alley lies to the east.

south.description: A large plaza is in this direction.

west.description: A building is in this direction.

rooms.name: Central Plaza
rooms.description:
You are at the Central Plaza of the downtown district.  There are a couple
of juves Boingging (tm) in the air above you.  Max Jaffa Boulevard goes
east, the Megway continues north and south, and Bazza's Home for the
Terminally Sarky is to the west.

north.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

east.description: Max Jaffa Boulevard goes in this direction.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

west.description: A home for Sarky people is to the west.

rooms.name: Corner of Ed Hilldreth Memorial Parkway and Megway
rooms.description:
Another major intersection which is being negotiated by vehicles that
are bound to minimum speed limits.  Many Slow Driving offenses are being
handed out by the Judges.  The Megway goes north and south, a Parkway
goes east, and Nu Phisog Parlour is west.

north.description: A plaza is to the north.

east.description: Ed Hilldreth Mem. Parkwy is to the east.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

west.description: A City Block lies to the west.

rooms.name: Mahmount Allesh Megway
rooms.description:
As you travel the Megway you notice many citizens participating in their
favorite hobbies such as spot welding and metalwork, scratch building
fashion Kneepads, giving blood, or just looking out the window.  The
Megway continues north and south.

north.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

south.description: The Megway continues in this direction.

rooms.name: Mahmount Allesh Megway
rooms.description:
The Megway ends here.  To the west is Ziggi Piggi's Home for the
Semi-Stiff, to the east and south are construction areas, and the
Megway goes north.

west.description: Ziggi Piggi's Home the Semi-Stiff is ahead.

rooms.name: Junket Way
rooms.description: Junket Way a small Skedway continues east and west.

rooms.name: Davies Alley
rooms.description:
You are in a very dark and seedy alley.  This is just the right place for
a bite fight.  Bite fighting is an illegal activity where both combatants
can only use their sharpened teeth as weapons.

rooms.name: Max Jaffa Boulevard
rooms.description: Max Jaffa Boulevard continues east and west.

west.description: A large plaza is to the west.

rooms.name: Ed Hilldreth Memorial Parkway
rooms.description: The Parkway goes east and west.

rooms.name: Construction site of the Harold Finkelbaum Block.
rooms.description:
A Mega-City One City Block is being constructed at this site.  A
typical block is from 100 to 1000 stories high with hundreds of
thousands inhabitants.

rooms.name: Corner of Junket Way and Threep Lane
rooms.description:
There is a second-hand kneepad stall is doing a brisk business with a
group of juves on their way to school.  Junket Way goes west and Threep
Lane travels south.

rooms.name: Threep Lane
rooms.description:
Threep Lane continues north and south.  There is a building to the east
with a sign next to the door.

east.description: A door to the east bodes ill.

extra_descriptions.description: Throt and Gleep's Megger Store est. 2107

rooms.name: Threep Lane
rooms.description: Threep Lane continues north and south.  There is a dark alley to the west.

rooms.name: Corner of Max Jaffa Blvd and Threep Way
rooms.description:
A proprietor of Uncle Sumpty's Ugly Emporium meanders by.  Threep Lane
continues north and south while Max Jaffa Boulevard goes west.

rooms.name: Corner of Ed Hilldreth Mem. Prkwy and Threep Lane
rooms.description:
Threep Lane goes north from here while Ed Hilldreth Memorial Parkway goes
west.

rooms.name: Construction Site for the Brit-Cit One tunnel.
rooms.description:
Construction is under way for the Black Atlantic Tunnel to connect
Mega-City One and Brit-Cit One.

rooms.name: Pustule Palace Cafe
rooms.description:
A scabrous hole.  Run by Ernie Ramirez, an ex-perp, it is a meeting place
for the low-life in the area.

rooms.name: Rietzik's Shuggy Hall
rooms.description:
A sleazy dive and the meeting place of a lot of perps.  Shuggy is a
twenty-second Century version of pool, played on a hilly table, usually
with large side bets.

rooms.name: Bazza's Home for the Terminally Sarky
rooms.description:
This is an experimental psychiatric home.  Named after a 20th Century
vid-critic, the home attempts, by various methods, to readjust the
socially unacceptable attitudes of the inmates.

rooms.name: Nu Phisog Parlour
rooms.description:
Opened as a direct rival to the New You Face Parlour chain to offer quick
and cheap face-changing facilities to the general public.  However,
since the closure of Sump's Ugly clinics, the craze for face-changing has
died down.

rooms.name: Ziggi Piggi's Home for the Semi-Stiff
rooms.description:
The only suspended animation parlour in the area.  It has a high turnover
rate.  It is rumored that the patrons are being used in body sharking and
organ legging activities.

rooms.name: Throt & Gleep's Megger Store
rooms.description:
This place promises to provide everything that the citizens don't need,
with the utmost discourtesy.  Of course, something as crazy as this was
bound to succeed.  There is a door to the north with a slot next to it.
There is also a sign next to the slot.

rooms.name: Stockroom of Throt & Gleep's Megger Store
rooms.description:
Many useless items stock the shelves of this stockroom.  A door leads
south and large vault door is to the north.

extra_descriptions.description:
This vault seems impervious to breaking.  There is a keyhole in the lock
however.

rooms.name: Throt & Gleep's Vault
rooms.description: The vault is musty with a slight smell of ozone in the air.

mobiles.name: a juve
mobiles.description: A juve is standing here plotting mischief.

mobiles.name: a punk
mobiles.description: A punk is here plotting a crime wave.

mobiles.name: a Futsie
mobiles.description: A Futsie is here reciting Monty Python sketches.

mobiles.name: a Citi-Def Militiaman
mobiles.description: A Citi-Def Militiaman is here contemplating a Block War.

mobiles.name: a dunk
mobiles.description: A dunk is here blending into the crowd.

mobiles.name: a tap
mobiles.description: A tap is here eyeing your belongings.

mobiles.name: a rookie judge
mobiles.description: A Rookie judge is on his first beat here.

mobiles.name: Wallaby Gleep
mobiles.description: Mr. Gleep is here wanting to know what you want.

mobiles.name: Pinkerton Throt
mobiles.description: Pinky Throt is here Wringing his hands.

mobiles.name: Ernie Ramirez
mobiles.description: Ernie Ramirez is here collecting for the mob.

mobiles.name: Judge Eckersely
mobiles.description: Judge Eckersely is here shaking down a Perp.

mobiles.name: Judge Beddows
mobiles.description: Judge Beddows is here calling Resyk.

mobiles.name: a bite fighter
mobiles.description: A bite fighter is here sharpening his teeth.

objects.name: a spit gun
objects.description: There is a spit gun laying here.

objects.name: a set of knee pads
objects.description: There are some knee pads laying here.

objects.name: a stooky gland
objects.description: There is a stooky gland laying here.

objects.name: a lawgiver
objects.description: There is a lawgiver laying here.

objects.name: the magnetically shielded safe
objects.description: A indestructible, immobile safe is here.

objects.name: a code box
objects.description: A code box of indeterminate use is here.

objects.name: a bashball bat
objects.description: A bashball bat is laying here.

objects.name: a Hoover vacuum cleaner
objects.description: A Hoover vacuum cleaner is here idling.

objects.name: a knife
objects.description: A knife is sitting here...contemplating life.

objects.name: a wet noodle
objects.description: A wet noodle is laying here with clam sauce on it.

objects.name: a Judge's club
objects.description: A Judge's club is resting here.

objects.name: a key card
objects.description: A key card is laying here.

objects.name: a Judge's club
objects.description: A Judge's club is resting here.

objects.name: a shock club
objects.description: A sparking electric club is here.

objects.name: a police stun stick
objects.description: A police issue stunner is here, must be stolen.
